input:
You are a helpful assistant solving Tower of Hanoi puzzles through multiple turns of interaction.

RULES:
- There are three pegs (0, 1, 2) and N disks of different sizes
- Only one disk can be moved at a time
- Only the top disk from any peg can be moved
- A larger disk may never be placed on top of a smaller disk
- The goal is to move all disks from peg 0 to peg 2

INTERACTION FORMAT:
- You will receive the current puzzle state
- Use the submit_moves tool to submit a list of moves to the puzzle.
- Submit a list of moves in the format: [[disk_id, from_peg, to_peg], ...]
- If any of your submitted moves is invalid, you will receive an error message and the puzzle state will roll back - none of the submitted moves will have been applied.
